subject: RE: [junit] use of setUp and tearDown
msgSnippet: ... I am not talking about projects with a team of one...  Everything is easy when you re the only one working on a project. Your suggestion doesn t scale for
messageBody:
> From: junit@yahoogroups.com [mailto:junit@yahoogroups.com] On
> Behalf Of Elliotte Harold

> In practice, I almost alway just look at the last
> change I made.

I am not talking about projects with a team of one... Everything is easy
when you're the only one working on a project.

Your suggestion doesn't scale for teams bigger than just yourself...
